name: Eaglercraft
description: Eaglercraft, an AOT compiled voxel game inspired from Minecraft designed to run on Javascript. It uses TeaVM and LAX1DUDE's OpenGL emulator to run a Java virtual machine fully compatible with browsers.

name: Super Mario 64
description: Super Mario 64 is a classic 3D platformer game where players control Mario as he navigates through various levels to collect Power Stars and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches. The game revolutionized the gaming industry with its innovative gameplay mechanics and open-world design.

name: Mario Kart DS
description: Mario Kart DS is a racing game featuring iconic Nintendo characters competing in kart races on various tracks. Players can use power-ups and weapons to gain an advantage over their opponents in this fast-paced and entertaining game.

name: New Super Mario Bros
description: New Super Mario Bros for the Nintendo DS is a beloved side-scrolling platformer game that brought the classic Mario gameplay into the handheld realm. Released in 2006, it offered players a mix of nostalgia and new features with updated graphics, new power-ups, and exciting level designs.
